Name: 1-methylcyclopropene production | 1-methylcyclopropene | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: 1-Methylcyclopropene is manufactured in a from methallylchloride, which is treated with a strong base (sodium amide) to yield 1-Methylcyclopropene and sodium chloride. A yield of 80% was assumed.;C4H7Cl+NaNH2 -> C4H6+NaCl+NH3;Reference(s):;Clarke T. C., Duncan C. D., Magid R. M., (1971). An Efficient and Convenient Synthesis of 1-Methylcyclopropene, J. Org. Chem, 36, 1320.;Fisher F., Applequist D.E., (1965). Synthesis of 1-Methylcyclopropene,  J. Org. Chem., 30, 2089â€“2090.
